episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4001_1101_01:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] met Palmer in town,
and they were talking...
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4001_1001_07:
If it isn’t Barry! I see you’re full of energy,
as always!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4001_1001_09: I-I’m in a hurry! I’ll see you later!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4001_1001_12: Seems like Barry’s been avoiding me lately...
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4001_0302_15: Did you have a fight with him?
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4001_0402_16:
Not at all! We’ve been on good terms since I
came to Pasio.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4001_1001_18:
Perhaps I did something that upset him without me
realizing.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/6801_1031_01:
I’ll have to give my
best effort.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/6801_1001_02: I wonder how far we can go!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/6801_1001_03:
It’s been a while since we last went out seeking
strong opponents.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/6801_1001_04: We could chance across our friends.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/6801_1001_05: Yeah! I’d love to see how strong they’ve gotten!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4002_1101_01:
A few days passed since Barry and Palmer
bumped into each other in town.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4002_1101_02:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was training with
Barry, Norman, and Brendan.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4002_1001_03: Hmm, you’re all starting to look tired.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4002_1001_04: Let’s end our training for today.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4002_1001_06:
I can handle it—no problem! Let’s keep going a
bit longer!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4002_1001_07:
It’s important to push yourself, but you also need
to rest.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4002_1001_08: Yeah! You won’t improve if you rush things!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4002_1001_09: M-maybe you’re right...but that’s not the point!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4002_1001_10: Is there a reason you’re in such a hurry?
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4002_1001_13: I mean, everyone wants to get stronger, right?
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4002_0302_16:
You were panicking the other
day, too.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4002_0402_17: Wha—?! N-no! Dad has nothing to do with it!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4002_1001_18:
It seems like something happened between you
and Palmer.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4002_1001_19: Did you two have a fight?
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4002_1001_22: The other day, I met Daddy—I mean, Dad...
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4002_1001_23:
And at the time, I was so excited, I said I’d gotten
stronger than him!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4002_1001_24:
That made him super happy, so we battled
together on the same team so I could show
him what I can do...
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4002_1001_25:
But I just stood there and watched as he
overwhelmed our opponents.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4002_1001_26: It was like I couldn’t keep up.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4002_1001_27:
I felt like I was seeing the true strength of “the
strongest of the Frontier Brains.”
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4002_1001_28:
I really thought I’d gotten stronger during my
adventures in Sinnoh and my training on Pasio...
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4002_1001_30: So I want to make sure what I said comes true...
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4002_1001_31:
by training a lot—and getting stronger as quickly
as possible!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4002_1001_32:
I’m afraid of disappointing my dad, so I can’t face
him until I’ve gotten stronger.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4002_1001_34: I kinda get how you feel, Barry!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4002_1001_35:
I always want to get stronger so that I live up to
my dad’s expectations!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4002_1001_36: Hehe! I knew you’d understand, Brendan!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4002_1001_37: I know how you feel, too.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4002_1001_38:
But I don’t think Palmer will ever be disappointed
in you.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4002_1001_39: R-really? Dad can be pretty strict sometimes...
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4002_1001_41:
I won’t face my dad until I’M satisfied with how
strong I am!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4002_1001_42: You’re very stubborn, just like someone I know.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4002_1001_43:
If you behave like that, Palmer will just worry
about you.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_1001_01: You’re one of the Frontier Brains...
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_1001_02:
Indeed—I’m Argenta, the Hall Matron. Nice to
meet you all.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_0401_04: *chuckle* Thank you! You’re sure full of energy!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_0402_06:
Are you trembling with excitement? You must
be confident in your skills.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_1001_07:
I’m Norman, a Gym Leader in Hoenn. This is
my son...
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_1001_08: I’m Brendan! Nice to meet you, Argenta!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_1001_10:
Y-you’re a Frontier Brain, like my dad? What’s a
Frontier Brain doing here?!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_1001_11:
Palmer was acting weird, so I wanted to help him
out a little.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_1001_12:
I came to check on you because I thought
something must’ve happened between you two.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_1001_13:
So Barry...do you really have that little confidence
in your strength?
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_1001_14: Well...compared to my dad, I’m nothing yet.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_1001_16: Your strength and shine are yours alone.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_1001_18: Even Frontier Brains have different strengths.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_1001_19:
A Trainer who can bring out the power of
any Pokémon...
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_1001_20: A Trainer who good fortune follows.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_1001_21: A Trainer who’s committed to his master...
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_1001_22:
There’s a place where everyone can shine. That
goes for any and every kind of Pokémon, too.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_1001_23: And I think the Battle Frontier is proof of that.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_1001_24: Palmer is one of the strongest Frontier Brains.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_1001_25: It’s true he can be strict.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_1001_26:
But he doesn’t look down on the other
Frontier Brains.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_1001_27:
Which means we can continue to praise each other
and raise each other’s potential.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_1001_28:
Given that you’re his son, you of all people should
understand Palmer best, wouldn’t you say?
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_1001_30: Yeah, of course I know him well!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_1001_31:
My dad treats all Trainers equally, regardless of
their strength!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_1001_33:
Which is why you should show him your OWN
strength—unique to you, right now!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_0301_35: Palmer must be waiting for you!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_1001_40:
This is the only time I can show him who I am
right now!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_1001_42: I want to show my dad the results of my training!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_1001_43: Yeah! Give it your all, Barry!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_1001_44:
Palmer would want to see how much
you’ve grown!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_1001_45: Yeah, and he’ll be delighted to battle his own son.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_1001_46:
Parents always love seeing how their kids
have grown.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_1001_48:
I gonna show my dad everything I’ve got!
Thanks, everyone!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_1001_49: It seems he’s figured things out.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4003_1001_50:
I’ve already involved myself, so we might as well
see how it goes.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4004_1001_05:
You don’t need to compare yourself to me or copy
how I battle.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4004_1001_06:
You should find your own strength—and keep on
improving!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4004_1001_07: As expected, Palmer doesn’t seem to mind!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4004_1001_08: Yeah, that’s what it’s like to be a father.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4004_1001_09: *sigh* I was worried I’d done something wrong.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4004_1001_11: Did you give Barry some advice?
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4004_1001_14: I had an idea! I want you to see me as I am now!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4004_1001_15:
So, I’ll show you what I couldn’t do during our
team battle before!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4004_1001_18: Yeah, bring it on! Such confidence!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4004_1001_19: Well, things certainly turned around quick!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4004_1001_20: But we won’t say no, of course!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4004_1001_22:
Then maybe we should lend you our strength,
Palmer.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4004_1001_23: This should be a fun battle!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4004_1001_26: I’ll show you everything I’ve got!
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4004_1001_28:
Show me the bond you’ve built with
your Pokémon.
episode_event_ch0203_ch0134/4004_1001_29: Show me the skill you’ve acquired as a Trainer!
